relevant_findings.general: Cachectic female with constant movements of bilateral arms and legs.
relevant_findings.HEENT: Dry mucous membranes, no lesions. No lymphadenopathy or jugular venous distention.
relevant_findings.cardiac: Regular rate and rhythm, normal S1/S2, no murmurs, gallops, or rubs.
relevant_findings.lung: Clear to auscultation bilaterally, no wheezes, rales, or rhonchi, breathing comfortably without use of accessory muscles.
relevant_findings.abdominal: PEG tube in place with clean dressing. Abdomen is distended but nontender to palpation without rebound or guarding.
relevant_findings.extremities: Patient displays constant movement of bilateral upper and lower extremities.
relevant_findings.neurological: Left sided facial droop including forehead, strength intact bilaterally.
relevant_findings.skin: Warm and well perfused, no excoriations or lesions, no rashes.
